title: Cannot load and connect into the game

embed.description: Google Drive is a free way to keep your files backed up and easy to reach from any phone, tablet, or computer. Start with 15GB of Google storage - free.

body:
I cannot connect into any game (even custom) since this afternoon, even though everything was fine last night after updating the new patch. After champ select, I just could not get into the game and riot kept asking me to send error report. I don't even use any third-party software related to the gaming and I tried closing all the unnecessary apps, and I also tried restarting the client, restarting the laptop and reinstalling the client. Even my friends who are running tons of third-party apps are still loading normally. Nothing has worked so far. Please tell me what to do. My friends are all waiting for me to play but I cannot even get into the game even i did nothing wrong.

I have attached the link of analyzed results from hextech repair tool. Please solve it Riot. Please.

replies.body:
I need some help as well. I also don't have the xunyount.dll file in my disk.
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1bNTHOea3bfLHJcxcQa2o3fnbRCd6quLY

Update:

Seems like it works! After I delete the files that riot stuff told me, and finally get my client launched after half an hour of 'unreacting', I can load into practice tool now!

Will wait for my friend to test an aram later and will update here afterwards. If it works, I suggest everyone downloading the hextech repair tool and share the result on board to let riot see what you should delete from your laptop.

Awesome - glad we were able to get you back into the game.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Managed to get in finally! Good luck everyone

Experienced exact same issue and also found xunyount.dll on my computer. Was a struggle to delete it and immediately after deleting it experienced same issue as OP (i.e. league wont start after showing a brief logo). I was waiting for Riot response on this thread and tried to play some other games in the meantime and realized my battle net launcher would not work either. Did more research online and discovered that the xunyount.dll messes with lsp and was suggested a winsock reset, followed through steps here https://iihelp.iinet.net.au/Resetting_Network_Adapter_%28Winsock_Reset%29. Game is now working. Presumably windows will sort it self out (seeing as op was able to eventually get in), but i did not have to wait half an hour and hope. My internet was a bit sluggish immediately after restarting computer so follow the steps above at your own peril (but it is completely up to speed now). Leaving this here for anyone with the same problem.

I have the exact same issue here, i played till maybe 11 pm yesterday , but today when I got through champion select i could not actually get into the game. The game would just shut off and leave me with a reconnect button with a bug-splat report, no matter how many times i try to reconnect the game just kept crushing.  I definitely don't have the software "xunyou" on my pc, is there another software that might be causing problems?
After champ select I can’t load into my games. Fix pls

>Cannot load and connect into the game
>supercarl1010 (NA) 
>#submitted about a year ago

When i start a ranked game i can pick charekter but when the mach starts it doeasnt load and says thats there an error and i lost like 300lp over a month bekuz of that and it makes me mad even today i lost 36 lp bekuz of that plz fix it or do somethink or even if u can give me back my lp

When i start a ranked game i can pick charekter but when the mach starts it doeasnt load and says thats there an error and i lost like 300lp over a month bekuz of that and it makes me mad even today i lost 36 lp bekuz of that plz fix it or do somethink or even if u can give me back my lp
Whenever I accept a match it just lags out and gives me the option to reconnect but then once I click reconnect it doesn't let me back in to the game and stays on that same screen
Hey riot I’m having this happen to me as well
I have the same issues and dont know what to do ... can someone help me with this?
I have the exact same issue Can you help me please

Cant seem to get this working. Im gonna needs some help.



https://drive.google.com/open?id=1McMDt_Ws7s6xcfUqvGKkBexyd73oi_7_

I did the router reset and it solved the reconnect issue, but now I'm getting bug-splatted as well.

Edit : xunyount.dll is nowhere to be found on my PC.
same here and i got soft baned by riot thx alot really helps{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I have the same or if not a similar problem can you look at my file please??????

[problem](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1NM9nx-topSiFgSdZoFx_GPez-YUp_5_z/view?usp=sharing)   <------------------
Help me please i just wanna play again

As a follow-up, I uninstalled discord and other antivirus software but things did not change. Here is the link for the lol logs after I completed all the steps. 
https://drive.google.com/open?id=16ZnDrjwci5e7iXlEAQtckw_Qtu2sBBcm

Please let me know if I need to provide other files.

Thanks.

Hi there,

Looking at the logs... and it seems like you have this [software installed](http://www.xunyou.com/). Please uninstall and let me know if it fixes your problem. Thanks!

Hi,

I searched in my laptop and have not found this software called 'xunyou'. Is that possible that you can provide more details about it (maybe location, screenshot, etc.)?

Thanks.
C:\Windows\SysWOW64\xunyount.dll and C:\Windows\System32\xunyount.dll is usually where it is.

Update:

I delete the dll file but now I cannot even open the league client. The icon is there but when I double click that, nothing happens. I also tried reinstalling the client but still cannot open the client. So I guess some file is missing?

Here is the link for the newest log files if you need that:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1cR0yu7nki-7mAydLNjVnLIkvQcMeaX9j

Thanks.
Same issue.

Hi,

Thank you for providing the logs for us to look at. Unfortunately, I can't seem to access your links. Can you please make sure you've shared it publicly? Thanks!

Hi,

yeah I just updated the setting. You can try again now. Thank you for letting me know.
